titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1852) to modernize and update the National Housing Act and enable the Federal Housing Administration to use risk-based pricing to more effectively reach underserved borrowers, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1852) to modernize and update the National Housing Act and enable the Federal Housing Administration to use risk-based pricing to more effectively reach underserved borrowers, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-330, by Ms. Matsui.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1852 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 115.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 650.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 191 (Roll no. 871).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 190 (Roll no. 872).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1852 (Expanding American Homeownership Act of 2007).
